alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:56PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Coffee, western Geneva, north central Walton and northwestern Holmes Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Samson, or 12 miles northwest of Geneva, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Enterprise, Samson, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Perry Store, Gaskin, Lytle, Lucile, Darlington, Marl, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Geneva Municipal A/P, Goodman, Smith Crossroads and Izagora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
